duties_responsibilities.duty: Screen and evaluate gynecologic and non-gynecologic specimens for possible malignant or abnormal conditions
Perform microscopic evaluation of cytological specimens and maintain accurate documentation of workload as required by CLIA and laboratory guidelines
Finalize testing results into the computer in an accurate and timely manner and provide backup for cytology processing as needed
Comply with safety, infection control, and HIPAA policies

education_certification.credential: B.A./B.S. in Biological Science with Cytotechnologist (CT) Certification, plus 1-3 years of experience and successful completion of an accredited Cytology program
